	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Carcinogens - </span><span class="text_73">புற்று</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நோய்க்காரணி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Cerebrospinal fluid - </span><span class="text_73">மூளை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">தண்டு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">வட</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">திரவம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Crop - </span><span class="text_73">தீனிப்பை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Controlled chain reaction - </span><span class="text_73">கட்டுப்படுத்தப்பட்ட</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">தொடர்வினை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Ductility - </span><span class="text_73">கம்பியாக</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நீட்டுதல்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Deliquescent substance - </span><span class="text_73">நீர்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">ஈர்த்து</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கரையும்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பொருள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Dwarfism - </span><span class="text_73">குள்ளத்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">தன்மை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Dormancy - </span><span class="text_73">தூங்கு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நிலை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">அல்லது</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">ஓய்வு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நிலை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Dihybrid cross - </span><span class="text_73">இரு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பண்பு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கலப்பு</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Diastema - </span><span class="text_73">பல்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">இடைவெளி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Diaphragm - </span><span class="text_73">உதரவிதானம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Dispersion - </span><span class="text_73">நிறப்பிரிகை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Ethnobotany - </span><span class="text_73">தாவர</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">தொடர்பியல்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Earthing - </span><span class="text_73">புவியிணைப்பு</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Electric potential - </span><span class="text_73">மின்னழுத்தம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Equilibrant - </span><span class="text_73">எதிர்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">சமனி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Functional group - </span><span class="text_73">வினைச்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">செயல்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">தொகுதி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Froth floatation - </span><span class="text_73">நுரை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">மிதப்பு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">முறை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Fossils - </span><span class="text_73">புதை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">உயிர்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">படிமம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Goitre - </span><span class="text_73">முன்கழுத்துக்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கழலை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Gigantism - </span><span class="text_73">அசுரத்தன்மை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Green Revolution - </span><span class="text_73">பசுமை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">புரட்சி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Genetic Engineering - </span><span class="text_73">மரபுப்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பொறியியல்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Genotype - </span><span class="text_73">மரபு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">வகை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Geotropism - </span><span class="text_73">புவிஈர்ப்பு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">சார்பு</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Hard soap - </span><span class="text_73">வன்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">சோப்பு</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Hygroscopic substance - </span><span class="text_73">நீர்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">ஈர்க்கும்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பொருள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Homozygous - </span><span class="text_73">ஒத்த</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கருநிலை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Homologous organs - </span><span class="text_73">அமைப்பு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">ஒத்த</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">உறுப்புகள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Hermaphrodite - </span><span class="text_73">இருபால்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">உயிரி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Heterodont - </span><span class="text_73">மாறுபட்ட</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பல்லமைப்பு</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Hydrogen bomb - </span><span class="text_73">ஹைட்ரஜன்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">குண்டு</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Hyper meteropia - </span><span class="text_73">தூரப்பார்வை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Impulsive - </span><span class="text_73">உந்து</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">விசை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Infrasonic sound - </span><span class="text_73">குற்றொலி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Mass percentage - </span><span class="text_73">நிறை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">சதவீதம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Medulla oblongata - </span><span class="text_73">முகுளம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Mutation - </span><span class="text_73">சடுதி</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">மாற்றம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Molds – </span><span class="text_73">பூசணங்கள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Menarche - </span><span class="text_73">பருவமடைதல்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Myopia - </span><span class="text_73">கிட்டப்பார்வை</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Non- conventional energy resource - </span><span class="text_73">மரபு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">சாரா</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">ஆற்றல்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">வளங்கள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Non- Aqueous - </span><span class="text_73">நீரிலி</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கரைசல்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">அல்லது</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நீரற்ற</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கரைசல்</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Natural radioactivity - </span><span class="text_73">இயற்கை</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கதிரியக்கம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Nuclear fusion - </span><span class="text_73">அணுக்கரு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">இணைவு</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Oncology - </span><span class="text_73">புற்றுநோயியல்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Pacemaker - </span><span class="text_73">இதய</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">இயக்கம்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">சீராக்கி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Phagocytic - </span><span class="text_73">நோயணுஉண்ணி</span><span class="text_12"> / </span><span class="text_73">செல்விழுங்கி</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Parthenocarpic fruits - </span><span class="text_73">கருவுறாக்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">கனிகள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Plastids - </span><span class="text_73">கணிகங்கள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Plant breeding - </span><span class="text_73">தாவர</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பயிர்ப்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பெருக்கம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Polyploidy - </span><span class="text_73">பன்மயம்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Parturition - </span><span class="text_73">குழந்தைப்</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">பிறப்பு</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Relative molecular mass - </span><span class="text_73">ஒப்பு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">மூலக்கூறு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நிறை</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Respiratory Quotient - </span><span class="text_73">சுவாச</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">ஈவு</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Suckers - </span><span class="text_73">ஒட்டு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">உறிஞ்சிகள்</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Softy measures - </span><span class="text_73">பாதுகாப்பு</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">நடவடிக்கைகள்</span></p>

	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Vestigial organs - </span><span class="text_73">எச்ச</span><span class="text_12"> </span><span class="text_73">உறுப்புகள்</span></p>
	<p class="block_1234"><span class="text_12">Wobble - </span><span class="text_73">தள்ளாட்டம்</span></p>
